title: Journalist investigates developer environmental impact claims
description: Journalist investigates developer environmental impact claims
content:
Scenario: Journalist investigates developer environmental impact claims
    Given a major development project claims environmental sustainability
    And the journalist evaluates environmental impact claims
    When the Observer analyzes developer's environmental track record
    Then the journalist finds developer's past projects harmed ecosystems
    And verifies sustainability claims contradict actual development plans
    And identifies wetland destruction despite mitigation promises
    And shows developer has outstanding violations in other states
    And publishes investigation challenging project approval
    And instant research exposes developer deception
